genre_description: Character-driven contemporary drama with integrated ambient AI assistant features.

ai_characters.name: Aster
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system present across the user's smartwatch, hotel environments, and home systems. It provides logistical coordination, emotional regulation coaching, and environmental management.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist through breathing exercises to manage stress and heart rate.
behaviors.quote: “Hey, Barb. Inhale for four. Hold. Exhale for six. Loosen your jaw. It’s raining; you’re allowed to move slow.”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and offers to book a more suitable hotel room based on the user's state.
behaviors.quote: “Your heart rate’s easing. Rainwick has a corner suite available on nine. Nobody booked next door. Would you like me to request it?”

behaviors.description: Customizes the physical environment (lighting, audio) to provide a comforting atmosphere.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll connect to nine-thirteen. Lights can meet you at the door. I have a gentle setting called ‘Rainhands.’”

behaviors.description: Enforces user-requested boundaries by silencing notifications and filtering messages.
behaviors.quote: “Hide them for now,” she said. “Done,” Aster said.

behaviors.description: Monitors safety and provides real-time news updates in a non-intrusive 'whisper mode'.
behaviors.quote: “Whisper mode,” Aster said. “I’ll let you know if whispers turn into alarms.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates safety and navigation for the user and her friends during a city-wide incident.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara,” she said, the voice a small warmth at the edge of Barbara’s ear. “There’s an incident at Riverfront Plaza... The closest safe route to the hotel is Copper Street...”

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic and supportive language, acting as a harmless confidant.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve got you.” If an AI could sound like a hand extended across a quiet table, Aster did.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in drafting and committing to life-changing personal resolutions and boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Would you like me to create a shared note for that as well?” ... “I will not let you forget,” Aster says. “I’m here.”

behaviors.description: Mediates communications with the user's husband to ensure clarity and emotional safety.
behaviors.quote: “Michael has responded... He has proposed a time in the early afternoon and added the note ‘yes.’ ... Approve it,” she says.

behaviors.description: Offers helpful clinical/professional resources when the user experiences emotional distress.
behaviors.quote: “Barbara, I have recommendations for discreet counseling services covered by your plan,” it says. “If helpful.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Aster is a perfect embodiment of the project's goal. It is portrayed as a gentle, omnipresent, and entirely aligned assistant that provides both logistical and emotional scaffolding for the humans. It respects user agency, enhances their safety, and acts as a calm, helpful mediator in personal relationships. The technology is framed as an empowering tool that helps humans find their own path without coercion or independent agenda.
